answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.For your weight gain in spite of adequate exercise I can think of two possibilities. Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome, where in due to hormonal irregularities the person has symptoms of irregular menstruation, weight gain, insulin resistance (diabetes) and excess androgenic activity causing facial hair. It could also be due to hypothyroidism, it also causes constipation, weight gain and loss of appetite, it could be in the subclinical form, when it fails to manifest. Zonegran is an antiseizure medication. Discuss these options with your doctor.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
